name: IOHIDDevice
desc: An object containing the low-level behavior for all HID device providers.

items.name: - handleReport
items.desc: Handles an asynchronous report received from the HID device.

items.name: - getReport
items.desc: Gets a report from the HID device.

items.name: - setReport
items.desc: Sends a report to the HID device.

items.name: - CompleteReport
items.desc: Completes all async requests made when getting or setting a report.

items.name: - setProperty
items.desc: Updates the specified property on the corresponding kernel object.
